dataset_id: BOREAS Level-3b AVHRR-LAC Imagery: Scaled At-Sensor Radiance in LGSOWG Format
title: BOREAS Level-3b AVHRR-LAC Imagery: Scaled At-Sensor Radiance in LGSOWG Format
summary: Data acquired from the AVHRR instrument on the NOAA-9, -11, -12, and -14 satellites were processed and archived. A few winter acquisitions are available, but the archive contains primarily growing season imagery.  These gridded, at-sensor radiance image data cover the period of 30-Jan-1994 to 18-Sep-1996.  Geographically, the data cover the entire 1000 km x 1000 km BOREAS Region.
